attributes.action: We do not want a European President
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
we did not vote for a european president

there is no need for a european president.to many powers have already been taken away from our elected parliment.enough is enough. we have not had our referendum on the eu, no more powers to that unelected body. their booksnever balance this will not make it more efficient just a further gravy train for more unelected members.let us vote now the only reason for not having a referendum is because you would lose it.resign now so that the next government can grant our wish. lastly say no no to tony blair.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
